msgSnippet: Where did you put the junit directory?  Did you include junit.jar in the classpath? my set up: export JUNIT=/usr/local/junit3.8.1 so I have to add /junit.jar

Where did you put the junit directory?  Did you include junit.jar in 
the classpath?

my set up:
export JUNIT=/usr/local/junit3.8.1

so I have to add /junit.jar to classpath:

javac -classpath $JUNIT/junit.jar:. MyTest.java

and

java -cp $JUNIT/junit.jar:. junit.swingui.TestRunner MyTest

HTH,
-Tom.

On Thursday, June 17, 2004, at 01:49 PM, m.j.mcardle@... wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I'm new to using to junits and linux. I've installed junits and
> believe I've set the classpaths right but java junit.textui.TestRunner
> junit.samples.AllTests etc don;t work and simply give exceptions.
>
> Can someone give me indepth instructions on how to install junits on
> Linux please. I'm running Fedora 2 linux.
>
> Many Thanks in advance
>
> Melissa
